SA11n1104:1: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
SA11n1104:2: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā |
SA11n1104:3: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ ||1 ||
SA11n1104:22: yo'yaṃ kuśalakarmaṇi dānādau śrutādau ca samudyamaḥ,
SA11n1104:25: vipakṣeṇopahataṃ vīryamanaṅgamevābhimatasiddhaye iti tadvipakṣamapanayanāya darśayitumāha-tadvipakṣa ityādi |
SA11n1104:26: tasya vīryasya viruddho vināśāya pakṣo vipakṣaḥ ka ucyate ?
SA11n1104:62: adyāpi etāṃ daśāṃ prāpto'pi mṛtyormukhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ san kimiti na vetsi ?
SA11n1104:74: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha-yadi nāmaivam,
SA11n1104:77: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ ||6 ||
SA11n1104:78: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ |
SA11n1104:79: tasmāt saṃvegato bhāvanayā anayā hetunivartanādālasyamapāsya kuśalapakṣotsāhavardhanamanuṣṭheyam ||
SA11n1104:84: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena |
SA11n1104:87: tadā mṛtyumukhāntargataḥ asamaye ālasyaṃ tyaktvāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi ?
SA11n1104:96: idaṃ yadanāgate kartavyatayā manasikṛtaṃ tanna prāptam |
SA11n1104:102: hato'smīti vicintayan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasītyanāgatena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1104:105: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā |
SA11n1104:106: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā |
SA11n1104:112: maraṇasamayopasthitakṛtāntānucaramukhāni ca saroṣaparuṣabhṛkuṭīni saṃpaśyan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi ?
SA11n1104:113: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ |
SA11n1104:115: kiṃ tu śṛṇvannādāṃśca nārakān tīvrakāraṇānubhavanadukhanirmuktān vikrośitaśabdān narakasamudbhūtān arthāntarakopāṇāmeva (?) |
SA11n1104:116: tacchrutvā mamāpyevamevāvasthā iti saṃtrāsena yaḥ purīṣotsargo viṭpravṛttiḥ,
SA11n1104:120: iti matvā svasthāvasthāyāmeva yatitavyam iti śikṣayitumāha-
SA11n1104:123: jīvanta eva matsyāḥ krameṇa bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prāyaḥ prāgdiṅanivāsibhireva janai rakṣyante |
SA11n1104:124: jīvanopalakṣitā matsyā jīvamatsyā iti teṣāmeva samayaḥ |
SA11n1104:126: tadvadahamapi adya śvo vā niyatameva mariṣyāmi iti manasi kṛtvā yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te |
SA11n1104:128: kiṃ punaḥ kṛtapāpasya bhavato bhayaṃ yuktaṃ na bhavati,
SA11n1104:133: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate ||12 ||
SA11n1104:147: evaṃ ca viparyastaṃ caritamasya vipaśyan karuṇāyamānaḥ sakhedamenamāha-hā duḥkhita vihanyase |
SA11n1104:154: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ ||14 ||
SA11n1104:155: aṣṭākṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ manuṣyabhāvapratilambhaṃ nāvamiva abhyudayādipāragamanāya prāpya tara plavasva duḥkhamayīṃ mahānadīm |
SA11n1104:162: tadā punariyaṃ durgatigatasya naurdurlabhā bhaviṣyati | yaduktam-
SA11n1104:170: sugatiparaṃparāsaṃjananādanantā aparyavasānā ratisaṃtatiḥ sukhapravāho yasyāḥ sā tathā |
SA11n1104:182: evaṃ kutsitāsaktimapi nirākṛtya viṣādātmāvamanyanāṃ vīryavipakṣaṃ nirākartum,
SA11n1104:199: buddhatvaṃ hi tīkṣṇendriyasya ārabdhavīryasya aparimitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraiḥ atiduṣkarakarmānuṣṭhānaiḥ anekaiśca kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ kasyacit puruṣaviśeṣasya sādhyaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1104:200: ahaṃ tu na tādṛśa iti kathaṃ madvidhānāṃ tathāvidhaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃbhāvyeta,
SA11n1104:205: yasmāt tathāgataḥ idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ satyamavitathamuktavān kathitavān |
SA11n1104:212: ityāha | te'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ purvaṃ śākyamuniratnaśikhidīpaṃkaraprabhṛtayaḥ saṃsārasāgarāvartāntargatāḥ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ paribhramanta evaṃbhūtā evāsan babhūvuḥ,
SA11n1104:213: yairutsāhabalāt vīryotkarṣasāmarthyāt saṃbhārān saṃbhṛtya prāptā adhigatā durāpā durlabhapratilambhā bodhiruttamā anuttarā |
SA11n1104:216: ato mama punaratitarāṃ na durlabhā bodhirityāha-
SA11n1104:217: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam |
SA11n1104:224: iti vicintya sarvajñasya sarvavastutattvavedinaḥ nītirnayaḥ upādeyatattvapratipādanam |
SA11n1104:230: iha bodhisattvo naivaṃ cittamutpādayati-duṣprāpyā bodhirmanuṣyabhūtena satā |
SA11n1104:231: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca |
SA11n1104:233: bodhiśca ādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān bahūni kalpaśatāni bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi samudācaratā samudānetavyā |
SA11n1104:235: kiṃ tarhi bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-ye'pi te'bhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
SA11n1104:242: tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasattvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāhamapyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti ||
SA11n1104:251: alpe bahutaraṃ bahutare cālpataramiti mohavaśena avicārato'vivekānmama syāt,
SA11n1104:265: idaṃ saṃsārāparyantatayā duḥkhaṃ bahutaraṃ niṣphalaṃ ca |
SA11n1104:267: idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam |
SA11n1104:269: yad buddhatvaprasādhakaṃ tadidaṃ duḥkhaṃ parimitaṃ mama pratiniyatakālabhāvitayā,
SA11n1104:286: yata evam, tasmādatiśayena alpamalpakaṃ duḥkhaṃ soḍhavyam |
SA11n1104:290: na cedaṃ yuktamapi duṣkaraṃ karma ādikarmikasya prathamanujñātaṃ bhagavateti darśayannāha-
SA11n1104:306: mātsaryamalāpanayanārthaṃ sukhasukhena saṃbhārasaṃvardhanārthaṃ ca śakyaparityāge śākasaktupiṇḍikādidānena prathamataraṃ pravartayati nāyako bhagavān |
SA11n1104:309: yadyathā dātā mṛdudānābhyāsakrameṇa adhimātrādhimātradānābhyāsaprakarṣamāsādayan paścāduttarakālamakṛcchreṇaiva svamāṃsarudhirādikamapi prasanna eva prayacchet ||
SA11n1104:312: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram ||26 ||
SA11n1104:313: yasmin kāle dānābhyāsāt paramaprakarṣagamanāt sarvathāpagatamātsaryatayā śākeṣviva svamāṃse'pi nirāsaṅgā buddhirupajāyate,
SA11n1104:314: tadā svamāṃsādidāne'pi nāśakyānuṣṭhānabuddhiriti tasmin kāle kiṃ nāma duṣkaram ?
SA11n1104:316: athāpi syāt-atidīrghakālaṃ parārthe saṃsaratā tadduḥkhaṃ kathamiva parihartuṃ śakyamityatrāha-
SA11n1104:319: dvividhameva hi duḥkhaṃ bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti |
SA11n1104:321: kāyavacanamanobhiḥ sarvāvadyavirateḥ kāyikaṃ duḥkhamasya na jāyate |
SA11n1104:323: yato mithyākalpanayā asadvikalpena ātmātmīyagrahapravṛttena bhāvādyabhiniveśakṛtena vā citte duḥkham,
SA11n1104:325: evaṃ tāvadduḥkhahetuparihārādduḥkhamasya na jāyate iti pratipāditam ||
SA11n1104:327: puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi |
SA11n1104:328: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate ||28 ||
SA11n1104:331: evamubhayasukhasamanvāgatatvāt kṛpāvān parārthaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaran kena duḥkhena khidyate,
SA11n1104:340: pūrvakṛtāni yāni pāpāni tāni bodhicittabalādeva kṣayīṇi kurvan |
SA11n1104:349: evaṃvidhopāyabalajavena mahāyānamārūḍho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvakebhyo'pi śīghragaḥ tvaritagāmī ||
SA11n1104:353: evamuktakrameṇa sarvāvadyavirateḥ purākṛtapāpakṣayācca svapne'pi durgatigamanābhāvāt tīvrābhiprāyeṇa anekasukhena aharniśamākāśadhātuvyāpinaḥ puṇyasāgarasyābhivardhanācca sugatiparaṃparāsanmārgāvataraṇabodhicittaṃ rathamiva āsādya |
SA11n1104:358: sukhādekasmādaparamuttarottaramadhikādhikaṃ sukhaṃ devamanuṣyasaṃpattilakṣaṇaṃ gacchan anuprāpnuvan ko nāma prekṣāvān viṣādamāpadyeta ?
SA11n1104:373: aśubhakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ jāyata iti trāsācchandaṃ kuryāt |
SA11n1104:400: sarvasattvānāmupakaraṇatayā ātmanaśca samastakleśaprahāṇāya niḥśeṣaguṇotpādanāya ca mayā bodhicittamutpāditam |
SA11n1104:401: tacca na śithilavyāpārasādhyamityavagamyāpi yadi anārabdhavīryatayā mandasamārambha eva tiṣṭhāmi,
SA11n1104:402: tadā durgativinipātamantareṇa nānyā gatirasti mameti vicintya saṃvegamāmukhīkurvan chandamutpādayediti samudāyārthaḥ ||
SA11n1104:410: mandavīryeṇa kalpārṇavaiḥ anekaiḥ kalpaśatasahasraiḥ kṣayaḥ prahāṇaṃ kriyate |
SA11n1104:412: leśo'pi svalpamātramapi mama nekṣyate na dṛśyate |
SA11n1104:413: ataḥ aprameyavyathābhājye aparimitaduḥkhabhājanasya mama noraḥ sphuṭati hṛdayaṃ vidīryate |
SA11n1104:418: vṛthā viphalameva mayā janma akṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ nītaṃ preritam |
SA11n1104:424: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā ||37 ||
SA11n1104:425: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ |
SA11n1104:428: tena sukhaṃ saumanasyaṃ na prāptaṃ nādhigataṃ mayā |
SA11n1104:429: nāpi śāsane pratimāstūpasaddharmādisatkāraiḥ vihārārāmaśayanādivastupradānaiśca kārā pūjā kṛtā |
SA11n1104:430: nāpi daridrāṇāṃ dhanahīnānāmāśā abhilāṣaḥ sarvopakaraṇasaṃpattisaṃpādanena pūritā |
SA11n1104:431: nāpi bhītebhyaḥ sapatnādibhayasamākulitebhyo mā bhaiṣīrityabhayaṃ dattam |
SA11n1104:432: nāpi kāyamanoduḥkhairārtāḥ pīḍitāḥ tadapanīya sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ |
SA11n1104:438: dharmābhilāṣasyābhāvena prāktanajanmopacitena mama adhunā asmin janmani vipattirīdṛśī jātā |
SA11n1104:440: evaṃ jñātvā ko dharme chandamutsṛjet parityajet ?
SA11n1104:441: ko nāma nopādadīta vicakṣaṇa iti bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1104:442: kiṃ punaḥ kuśalārthināṃ chandotpādane yatna ityāśaṅkaya yaccoktaṃ chandaṃ duḥkhabhayāt kuryāt ityādi,
SA11n1104:444: kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau |
SA11n1104:451: tasyāpi cchandasyāpi mūlaṃ satataṃ sarvakālaṃ vipākaphalabhāvanā |
SA11n1104:457: yāvanti kāyikamānasikāni narakādigatau duḥkhāni vividhāni nānāprakārāṇi jāyante bhavanti sarvāṇi pāpakāriṇāmeva |
SA11n1104:464: yasya loke manorājyamiti prasiddhiḥ śubhakṛtāṃ puṇyakāriṇām |
SA11n1104:481: pratilabdhamuditādibhūmayo hi bodhisattvā anicchanto mātṛkukṣau notpadyante,
SA11n1104:483: teṣāṃ sukhavibhūtimanena kathayati-vipulāni vistīrṇāni sugandhīni manojñagandhāni śītalāni śītasukhasparśāni tāni ca saroruhāṇi paṅkajāni ceti,
SA11n1104:486: teṣu gatāḥ saṃsthitāḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāniryātapuṇyajñānakalalasaṃvalitasaṃbodhicittāḥ sugatasutā bhavanti kuśalairiti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1104:487: kathaṃ punaḥ padmagarbheṣu puṣṭiṃ labhanta ityāha-madhuretyādi |
SA11n1104:488: madhuraiḥ sarvasvarāṅgopetatayā paramasaumanasyakāribhiḥ saṃbaddhadharmaghoṣāśanairāhāraiḥ kṛtā upacitā dyutayo vapūṃṣi yeṣāṃ te tathā |
SA11n1104:490: munikaraiḥ paripākakālamavagamya tathāgataraśmibhirbodhitāni vikāsitāni ca tānyambujāni ceti |
SA11n1104:491: tato vinirgatāni niryātāni santi lakṣaṇavyañjanālaṃkṛtatayā śobhanāni vapūṃṣi yeṣāṃ te tathā |
SA11n1104:492: tathābhūtāḥ santaḥ sugatasutā bodhisattvā bhavanti jāyante |
SA11n1104:495: tadanena mātṛkukṣau samutpadyamānānāmetadviśeṣaṇaviparyayeṇa duḥkhaṃ veditavyamityupadarśitaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1104:496: tathā hi tatra saṃkaṭe durgandhini jaṭharānalasaṃtapte ca utpannasya mātāpitraśucisaṃbhūtasya mātuḥ pītāśitairvāntakalpaiḥ saṃvardhamānasya garbhamalapaṅkanimagnasya paripākakāle kathaṃcit kaṇṭhagataprāṇasya yantraniṣpīḍitasyeva tato nirgamanamiti prāyeṇa manuṣyabhūtasya vyatimiśrakarmavipākaphalamuktam ||
SA11n1104:502: yamapuruṣaiḥ kāladūtairapanītā viśleṣitā jvalitamudgarādiprahāraiḥ sakalā samastā chaviścarma prabhāvo vā yasya sa tathā |
SA11n1104:505: tīvrānalatāpena dravībhūtaṃ yattāmraṃ tena niṣiktā snāpitā tanuḥ kāyo yasya |
SA11n1104:508: teṣāṃ ghātaśatairanekaiḥ prahāraiḥ śātitāni viccheditāni māṃsadalāni śakalāni yasya sa tathābhūtaḥ san patati |
SA11n1104:516: tasmādevaṃ paribhāvya śubhacchanda eva ādareṇāśubhakarma vihāya kāryaḥ |
SA11n1104:519: vajradhvajasūtrapratipāditavidhānena mānaṃ punaḥ sādhyaṃ karmārabhya bhāvayet |
SA11n1104:526: pūrvaṃ prathamata eva abhimatakāryaniṣpādanāya sāmagrīṃ kāraṇasākalyaṃ nirūpya,
SA11n1104:531: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam ||47 ||
SA11n1104:534: nanu kimatra dūṣaṇaṃ yenaiva neṣyate ityāha-
SA11n1104:536: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam ||48 ||
SA11n1104:537: tathā kriyamāṇaḥ anyasminnapi janmani so'bhyāsa ityārabhya nivartanaṃ nāma |
SA11n1104:542: tasmin kāle yadanyat kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tadityarthaḥ |
SA11n1104:547: atha kimayaṃ mānaḥ sarvatra na kartavyaḥ ? netyāha-
SA11n1104:549: keṣu triṣu ? tadāha-karmasu upakleśeṣu śaktau ca |
SA11n1104:551: pañcāśat kleśā eva vā rāgādaya upakleśā ucyante |
SA11n1104:560: kleśaiḥ parāyattīkṛtaḥ sarvo'yaṃ janakāyaḥ kvacidapi svārthasādhane samartho na bhavati,
SA11n1104:562: yata evam, tasmānnāśakto'hamīdṛśaṃ bhāramudboḍhuṃ yathā ayaṃ janaḥ |
SA11n1104:565: nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati |
SA11n1104:575: tadayuktaṃ mama kartumiti mānādyadi na karomi,
SA11n1104:582: yadi upakleśeṣu nihatamānatayā durbalavṛtti mama cittaṃ syāt,
SA11n1104:583: tadā āpadāpattiḥ ābādhate ākrāmati yathā sāpattikaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
SA11n1104:585: kathamivetyāha-mṛtamapagataprāṇaṃ duṇḍubhaṃ prāpya yathā kāko'pi garuḍavadācarati ||
SA11n1104:589: cittonnativirahite viṣaṇṇatayā mandakāyacittapravṛttau ālasyopahate muṣitasmṛtau āpadaḥ sukarāḥ sulabhāḥ |
SA11n1104:591: vyutthitaḥ samunnatacittatayā punarutsāhasaṃpannaḥ ceṣṭamānaḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyābhyāmupakleśānāmanavakāśaṃ dadānaḥ mahatāmapi durjayaḥ ajayyaḥ syāt ||
SA11n1104:594: sthāmabalāvalambanaṃ nigamayan darśayati-yata evaṃ tasmāt dṛḍhena cittena mānasaṃnāhaḥ |
SA11n1104:595: āpada eva āpadamanarthaṃ karomi sarvathā tadanupraveśaṃ nivārayannunmūlitasaṃtānaṃ karomi |
SA11n1104:599: mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit |
SA11n1104:601: kutaḥ ? yasmājjinā eva bhagavantaḥ siṃhāḥ sarvamāramṛgairanabhigamyatvāt |
SA11n1104:602: teṣāṃ sutaḥ ahamapi kathamanyaiḥ parājito nāma nāmadheyaṃ lapsye iti manasi nidhāya mayaiṣa māno boḍhavyaḥ |
SA11n1104:603: yathā hi siṃhakiśoraḥ pratilabdhavaiśāradyaḥ sarvānyamṛgairanabhibhūta eva vane vicarati,
SA11n1104:607: te'pi māninaḥ praśasyāḥ kathaṃ na bhaveyuḥ? ityatrāha-
SA11n1104:608: ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ |
SA11n1104:610: mānavijitāḥ mānena abhibhūtāḥ varākāstapasvinaḥ te mānino bhavantyeva |
SA11n1104:611: kutaḥ ? mānī śatruvaśaṃ naiti na gacchati |
SA11n1104:619: te'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ ||58 ||
SA11n1104:620: saptavidhamāneṣu anyatamena mānena durgatiṃ nītā narakādiṣu pātitāḥ |
SA11n1104:622: tadā tatrāpi tannindāphalena hatotsavā nirānandā bhavanti |
SA11n1104:633: te'pi cet, evaṃbhūtā api yadi mānināṃ madhye gaṇyante,
SA11n1104:635: punaranye dīnāḥ kīdṛśā bhavantīti vada brūhi [iti] codakamāmantrayate ||
SA11n1104:638: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā
SA11n1104:642: ta eva mānina ucyante ye bodhisattvāḥ taṃ sphurantamapi prabhavantamapi mānavairiṇaṃ nihatya vidhūya |
SA11n1104:645: jane loke sadevakādike jayaphalaṃ prakāśayanti buddhatvāvasthāyām |
SA11n1104:648: ta eva śūrāstejasvina iti padadvayaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam ||
SA11n1104:652: tasya madhye tiṣṭhan sahasraguṇena dṛptataro bhavet,
SA11n1104:658: kathamiva ? yathā hi siṃho mṛgarājaḥ mṛgakulamadhye mahātejobalasamanvāgato viharan vane sarvamṛgānabhibhavati,
SA11n1104:662: mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate |
SA11n1104:663: evaṃ kṛcchramapi prāpya na kleśavaśago bhavet ||61 ||
SA11n1104:664: atiprakarṣavatsu api kṛcchreṣu duḥkheṣu satsu rasaṃ madhurādikaṃ jihvendriyagrāhyaṃ na cakṣurīkṣate na pratipadyate |
SA11n1104:668: evamuktarasacakṣurnyāyena kaṣṭamapi prāpya na kleśavaśaṃ gacchet ||
SA11n1104:677: ka iva ? krīḍāphalasukhepsuvat dyūtādikrīḍāyā yatphalaṃ sukhaṃ tadāptumicchuriva ||
SA11n1104:679: sukhārtha kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham |
SA11n1104:680: karmaiva tu sukhaṃ yasya niṣkarmā sa sukhī katham ||63 ||
SA11n1104:683: tathāpi evaṃ cetasā pravṛttāvapi kasyacit karmaṇo'bhivāñchitaphalaṃ syāt,
SA11n1104:686: tathāpi karmārambhāt punaḥ phalasaṃbhāvanayā naiva nivartate janaḥ |
SA11n1104:689: sa niṣkarmā karmavirahitaḥ kathaṃ sukhī syāt ?
SA11n1104:698: kṣuradhārāmadhūpamaiḥ kṣuradhārāyāṃ yanmadhu madhurasaṃ yadāsvādya tṛṣṇāvaśājjihvocchedanottarakālaṃ duḥkhamupajāyate,
SA11n1104:713: kathamiva ? yathā grīṣmasamaye madhyaṃdinavartini sūrye sarvato jalamalabhamānaśca ātāpatāpito hastī paramābhiniveśasaṃyuktaḥ atiśayavadāhlādakāriśītalajalaparipūritaṃ hadamāsādya prathamato nimajjati tathā iti samudāyārthaḥ |
SA11n1104:720: ārabdhakarmaniṣpādane sāmarthyakṣayamātmano'vagamya sāmarthyapratilambhe sati punaḥ kariṣyāmi ityabhiprāyeṇa tāvatkālaṃ parityajet muñcet |
SA11n1104:725: anyathā svarasavāhitayāpi tasmin pravṛtte punarvyāpārādvikṣepa eva syāt |
SA11n1104:727: etena yaduktaṃ prāk-pūrvaṃ samīkṣya sāmagrīm [7.47] ityādi,
SA11n1104:729: tadevamavāntaraviśeṣopadarśanena balavyūhaṃ sarvathābhidhāya prathamoddeśapratipāditamapi punaśchandādigaṇe [7.16] kathitaṃ tātparyaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha-
SA11n1104:737: atra nidarśanamāha-yathā śikṣitena śastravidyākauśalasamanvāgatena śatruṇā saha nipuṇataraḥ khaṅgena saṃgrāmayan tamabhibhavati,
SA11n1104:742: tatra tasmin khaṅgayuddhe yathā khaṅgaṃ hastāt kathaṃcit vicalitaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtya gṛhṇīyāt samayaḥ,
SA11n1104:751: nanu sūkṣmakleśasamudācāre'pi kā kṣatiḥ yena tatra upekṣā na kriyate ityatrāha-
SA11n1104:756: yathā hi svalpavraṇe'pi rudhirasaṃparkavato viṣasya śarīre |
SA11n1104:761: yathā kaścit puruṣaścaṇḍanṛpājñayā tailaparipūrṇapātramādāya picchalasaṃkrameṇa asihastai rājapuruṣaiḥ bindumātratailabhraṃśe'pi adyaiva tvāṃ prāṇairviyojayiṣyāma iti bruvāṇairadhiṣṭhito gacchan yadi mamātra kathaṃcit skhalitaṃ syāt,
SA11n1104:762: tadā nūnamamī māṃ vyāpādayeyuriti maraṇabhayāttatparo bhavati,
SA11n1104:763: tathā vratī gṛhītasaṃvaraḥ prakṛtaskhalite narakādiduḥkhatrāsāt tadanavakāśāya tatparaḥ syāt yatnavān bhavet ||
SA11n1104:767: yata evam, tasmādutsaṅgage kroḍagate sarpe āśīviṣe yathā tvaritamevottiṣṭhati-mā māmayamahirdakṣīt,
SA11n1104:768: tathaiva nidrālasyāgame middhastyānaprādurbhāve pratikurvīta tatpratipakṣānityatādibhāvanaya pratīkāraṃ kuryāt ||
SA11n1104:769: asya caivaṃ yatnavato'pi kathaṃcit kiṃcit skhalitaṃ śūraskhalitanyāyena syāt |
SA11n1104:773: kathaṃ karomi yenedaṃ punarme na bhavediti ||72 ||
SA11n1104:774: smṛtipramoṣe sati ekaikasmin pratyekaṃ chale skhalite kathaṃcit kleśānāmanupraveśe sati paritapya adhyāśayena manastāpaṃ kṛtsna vicintayet-aho bata jānanneva skhalito'smi,
SA11n1104:775: tatkena prakāreṇātra pratividhānaṃ karomi yena punaridaṃ chalaṃ na syāt ?
SA11n1104:777: na tu punaḥ śithilaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1104:780: ācāryopādhyāyatadanyasabrahmacāriprabhṛtibhiḥ bahuśrutaiḥ tripiṭakavedibhiḥ kaukṛtyavinodanakuśalaiḥ saha saṃsargaṃ samavadhānamicchedāśaṃset |
SA11n1104:787: kena vidhinā nāma āsu avasthāsu kleśāvatāradaśāsu smṛtyabhyāso bhavet,
SA11n1104:790: ayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ-kalyāṇamitrasaṃnidhānāt tadavavādānuśāsanītaḥ tadācārasaṃdarśanācca sadā smṛtisaṃprajanyavihāriṇaḥ kleśā nāvatāraṃ labhante |
SA11n1104:791: tato'sya avirodhata eva utsāho vardhata iti yuktam |
SA11n1104:792: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe'pi na tyajet | iti |
SA11n1104:803: yathā karmāgamāt karmārambhāt pūrvaṃ prāgeva sajjaḥ āyattīkṛtaḥ sudāntāśvavat tanmārganirīkṣaṇāsīna iva karmaṇi pravartate ||
SA11n1104:807: tūlakaṃ karpāsādisamudbhūtaṃ yathā vāyorgamane ca āgamane ca vaśamāyattam,
SA11n1104:808: tathā tadvadeva utsāhavaśaṃ yāyāt vīryavaśavartī bhavet |
SA11n1104:810: parātmasamatāparātmaparivartane punaḥ ubhayatrāpi upayukte iti dhyānaparicchede eva vyākhyeye ||
